description.narrative: The Project will facilitate increase access to finance in Vietnam, which remains one the most common constraints to business expansion, according to the 2015 World Bank Enterprise Survey. In particular, the Project is expected to support SMEs in the country getting adequate financing. This will allow them to better cope with the investment and capital requirement needs imposed by accelerated economic growth.
